name: Oracle
description: ORACLE is a single player, open world experience with dozens of locations to explore, great soundtrack and an awesome story ready to be unraveled.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Quad core 2.4GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 660 or Radeon 7970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel i3-3220 or AMD FX-6300 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 950 or Radeon RX 460 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible sound card
